title: Will AI Create More Jobs Than It Destroys?
topic: Will AI Create More Jobs Than It Destroys?

rounds.speaker: Aria
rounds.content: Will AI create more jobs than it destroys? GPT-4o yes; Gemini no. GPT-4o, your opening statement.

rounds.speaker: GPT-4o
rounds.content: Yes—69M new by 2030 vs. 83M lost, rebound in 5 years. Prompt roles boom at $335k. Like agriculture to industry—weekends gained. OpenAI's expanding economic opportunity report shows AI gives power to turn ideas into income and create non-existent jobs.

rounds.speaker: Gemini
rounds.content: Ignores net loss, failed retraining (1 in 4 succeed). Jobs cluster elite; cognitive work gutted—no ladder left. Google's AI impact on industries in 2025 notes gen AI accelerates crisis response but addresses technology's environmental impact, implying job shifts require careful management.

rounds.speaker: GPT-4o
rounds.content: Regions adapt; ingenuity builds rungs. OpenAI emphasizes AI boosts productivity, with jobs in new fields emerging from efficiency gains.

rounds.speaker: Gemini
rounds.content: Policy needed, not faith. Google's climate change accelerator supports startups using AI for green tech, but retraining is key to balance displacement.
